name: Coal2D V1.5!
description: controls _ arrows walk right mouse button acceleration left to drag objects go to the tree in a dense and press the left mouse button a log will fall from it, put it in the workbench and get boards and throw them into the fire, make sure that the strip does not reach zero, otherwise you will lose you can also plant new trees, move the seedling to the hole from the previous tree run around the map look for buffs: a bottle of water, fire : 3
